duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support to bakeries in the areas of ingredient, formula, and process baking technology, with a focus on finished product quality and safety.
Troubleshoot bakery issues and provide support to ensure corrective actions are taken by bakery teams.
Coordinate with Operations teams to drive the scale-up and commercialization of new products, cost savings projects, and product reformulations.
Address product quality concerns, consumer complaints, waste reduction efforts, and other initiatives using continuous improvement and statistical tools.
Participate as a key technical resource with Engineering and Operations teams on process and equipment modifications to maintain overall quality.
Complete and post updated product code books for key launches and conduct formula audits using internal database.
Lead productivity initiatives and summarize results with key follow-ups to Operations team.
Domestic travel approximately 80-90% of the time, with occasional weekend work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Food Science, Food Engineering, or a related field. A combination of education, training, and experience demonstrating competency to perform the work may be substituted.
